This ice-blue half-mask is adorned with a wicked silver grin that covers the wearer's mouth, leaving the rest of the face uncovered. You gain a +3 item bonus to Intimidation checks.

Activateâ€”Hideous Wail 2 (concentrate, manipulate)

Frequency once per day

Effect The mask casts a 9th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Wails of the Damned]

Each living creature in a @Template[emanation|distance:40] takes @Damage[8d10[void]|options:area-damage] damage and must attempt a @Check[fortitude|dc:41|options:area-effect,damaging-effect] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes full damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Drained] [[/r 1d4]].

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Drained]{Drained 4}.
